## Mandatory Checklist

- [ ] One PR equals one ticket scope.
- [ ] No cross-milestone scope.
- [ ] No mixed feature + unrelated refactor.
- [ ] Conformance gate evidence included.
- [ ] Security gate evidence included.
- [ ] Performance gate evidence included.
- [ ] Accessibility gate evidence included.
- [ ] Evidence artifact paths are included.
- [ ] Rollback path is documented.
- [ ] If planning/spec conflict existed, conflict-arbitration issue link is provided.
